name: Platnium
description:
This is a rage game.

You may hate me for this even though it's a demo but, it was fun to make!

There are 6 level and a hidden route with 2 levels in this demo. I took inspiration from games such as The End Is Nigh, TorqueL, and a few more games that induce rage. 

The Best part of all? NO LEARNING CURVE! 

This way you can have all the rage you want without needing to be bad at the game! So enjoy the demo and I'll see you again when it's done!

                                                                                                                                           -HT
